raw_text: KURUPPU-HESKETH (AIA Wealth Planning,​ Ceylon Oxygen). Dearly beloved husband of Chandra. Ever loving father of Angelo and Thabeetha. father-in-law of Sujani and chandika,​ much loved grandfather of Hiruna,​ Yenuth,​ Chiara and Tiana. Loving brother of Late Frankie and of Terry,​ Yvonne,​ Flavia and Astrid. His remains will lie at A.F. Raymond’s funeral parlour on Monday 4th December from 10 a.m. onwards. Cortege leaves the parlour on Tuesday 5th December at 1.30 p.m for cremation at General Cemetery. Borella. (Old Crematorium) at 2.00 p.m.079957
